snippet: Despite the troubled past and drug history of Garrett Reid, the son of Eagles Coach Andy Reid, police said no suspicious activities were involved in his death.
abstract: Garrett Reid, the oldest son of Philadelphia Eagles Coach Andy Reid, is found dead in his dormitory room at the team’s training site in Bethlehem, Pa, after a troubled life that included a struggle with drug use and prison stints; no cause of death was given.
lead_paragraph: Despite the troubled past and drug history of Garrett Reid, the son of Eagles Coach Andy Reid, police said no suspicious activities were involved in his death.

headline.seo: Garrett Reid, Son of Eagles Coach, Dead at 29
headline.main: Eagles Coach’s Son, 29, Dies at Training Camp
headline.print_headline: Eagles Coach’s Son, 29, Dies at Training Camp
